remarks: Define the set of all Closed Walks (in an undirected graph) of a fixed length n as words over the set of vertices.  Such a word corresponds to the sequence p(0) p(1) ... p(n-1) of the vertices in a closed walk p(0) e(f(1)) p(1) e(f(2)) ... p(n-1) e(f(n)) p(n)=p(0) as defined in ~ df-clwlk .
